// 存储当前登录用户信息
import{CHANGE_RIGHT_TYPE,INIT_CHAT_INFO,INIT_FRIEND_INFO,RECEIVE_CHAT_MSG,SEND_CHAT_MSG,AUTH_SUCCESS,ERR_MSG,USERINFO,LOGOUT,MODIFY_USER_CONTACTS,GET_NEW_FRIENDS,GET_USER_MAILLIST}from"./action-type";export var initUser={userInfo:{},msg:'',redirectTo:'',token:null,contacts:[]};// 存储聊天信息等
export var initChatInfo={loading:true,messList:{},// 存放用户聊天记录
chatUserInfo:{},showRightType:'welcome'/* 右侧显示内容 */};// 存储当前点击的用户信息
export var friendInfo={newFriend:[],mailList:[],info:{}};// 同步 Action
export var initChatData=function initChatData(chat){return{type:INIT_CHAT_INFO,data:chat};};export var sendChatMsg=function sendChatMsg(chat){return{type:SEND_CHAT_MSG,data:chat};};export var receiveChatMsg=function receiveChatMsg(chat){return{type:RECEIVE_CHAT_MSG,data:chat};};export var showRightType=function showRightType(chat){return{type:CHANGE_RIGHT_TYPE,data:chat};};export var showFriendInfo=function showFriendInfo(friend){return{type:INIT_FRIEND_INFO,data:friend};};// 用户相关
export var authSuccess=function authSuccess(user){return{type:AUTH_SUCCESS,data:user};};export var userInfo=function userInfo(user){return{type:USERINFO,data:user};};export var logOut=function logOut(user){return{type:LOGOUT,data:user};};export var errMsg=function errMsg(msg){return{type:ERR_MSG,data:msg};};// 更新用户会话列表
export var modifyUserContacts=function modifyUserContacts(user){return{type:MODIFY_USER_CONTACTS,data:user};};// 获取好友申请列表
export var getNewFriends=function getNewFriends(list){return{type:GET_NEW_FRIENDS,data:list};};// 获取好友通讯录列表
export var getMailList=function getMailList(list){return{type:GET_USER_MAILLIST,data:list};};
